txt.en: The stumps of felled trees can be found standing sadly all around the White Hand encampment. The Huorn wishes to grieve for his fallen friends.
You have examined the remains of the grove felled by the White Hand Orcs in Fangorn. The survivor grieves for his fallen friends, as will Wisewood, the sleeping treeherd of this part of the forest.
The stumps of felled trees can be found standing sadly all around the White Hand encampment. The Huorn wishes to grieve for his fallen friends.
The Huorn mourns its fallen companion ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Examine the remains of the tree-herd ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Stumps of felled trees can be found around the White Hand Orc-encampment.\n\nYou should bring the Huorn to the stumps of trees so that he can see which of his former companions have been killed by the Orcs.
You have examined the remains of the grove felled by the White Hand Orcs in Fangorn. The survivor grieves for his fallen friends, as will Wisewood, the sleeping treeherd of this part of the forest.
